biocontainers.name: zorro
biocontainers.summary: Zorro is an hybrid sequencing technology assembler. it takes to sets of pre-assembled contigs and merge them into a more contiguous and consistent assembly. the main caracteristic of zorro is the treatment before and after assembly to avoid errors.
